nice product got for a chistmas gift

The face is much too large in proportion to the entire romper. They are happy with the top blouse and will get use of that.
Omg...this couldn't be cute. IT was adorable

Well made, soft, quality material. Color is a vibrant burgundy and is just so darned cute!
I was surprised by how lightweight and thin the dress material is. I was expecting a normal corduroy fabric; this is very flimsy and I'm unsure how well it will wash.
Value for my money and I love the design. My baby girl rock it so well. Good material, very comfortable.
I love that this has adjustable straps with the extra button. Super cute. Bought this outfit for my 3 month old. Got the 0-6 months.
Super cute for our photoshoot coming up.
I loved the fit with this dress. I purchased a 2T and my granddaughter is 18 months
This is an adorable onesie and jumper outfit. So cute. Fabric is so soft. It fits my newborn with room to grow.
the color of this outfit enchants me, my niece looks like a princess when she wears it.  it's really wow.

The "brown" outfit is more like a mustard yellow meets burnt orange color brown. In truth, the outfit is adorable. The only reason it gets three stars is because the straps to the dress part are way too big and slip off the shoulders constantly.
I recieved the item and although the skirt was cute I didn’t really like the material of the shirt and the way that it looked

This outfit for our granddaughter is so adorable. The colors match well & the fit was good.
My grand little will look so precious in this.

The outfit itself is cute. But the overall straps on the dress are very poorly sewn. They are not even close to the same length- one strap is almost 2 inches longer than the other, and the button placement is wacky, so the dress hangs completely crooked. I would return it for this reason, but I bought the item on sale for half off- so I will attempt to fix the straps myself. If I didn't have a sewing machine to fix it, the outfit would be unusable. The onesie is also much bigger than other baby clothes of this same size. I would be very annoyed if I had paid $30 for this- definitely not worth it, and poorly made.
It got the job done by having my baby girl cute for her first Halloween but the leggings are loose. The baby have to be super heavy to fit them properly

The onesie and green dress are adorable and look exactly like the photo. Where the issue is, is the sizing. Every company that makes clothes can vary in sizes, so I was incredibly surprised the 0-3 months is about the size of a 12 month dress I received at my baby shower. The 0-3 is very LARGE! I really got my hope up thinking it would fit my baby perfectly, I’m not sure what I was thinking! Still very cute!

评论概述: The straps were a bit longer than expected

Unbelievably cute but shirt could be made of a better fabric.  Its thin and a bit scratchy. The skirt is good quality.  Very cute for autumn
Suoer cute little outfit. I loved the design and the quality. Too bad she never wore it.

评论详情: Aesthetically, it's adorable, but the onsie, cute as it is... feels like low quality material. Maybe it's the "cotton blend" but I don't think stretchy is good baby fabric unless it's tights.  The corduroy jumper and headband are totally worth it though! I'll probably use the outfit once, but the jumper is better in person!  Ordered 6-9 months, and it appears slightly* big (for a 6 month old)  Overall, I'm happy with the purchase, and will try more from this shop.
Absolutely adorable and good quality!
The product is made of cheap material and the shirt portion is huge horizontally like they think the baby is really overweight.

评论概述: Sewn wrong and wayyyyyy too big

The onesies is cute, but the skirt is sewed wrong. Unbelievable lack of inspections on the items. We only noted it when we were heading to our photoshoot and there was no more time to make a change.
Purchased for my daughter. It fit well and looked beautiful on her. The quality of the clothing is good as well.

This outfit is adorable and my toddler looked so cute in it for our family pics. BUT the straps would not stay up, we were fixing them almost every time she moved and wound up having several pics where they’re halfway down her arms. Having a shoulder butting for the straps would be nice, or if it was all one piece even better. I would for sure buy it again for our pics know what I know now, but I might’ve stitched the straps to the onesie or added some good double sided to tape so we weren’t messing with them.
Adorable color scheme and is beautiful in the pictures. In person the fabric is very thin.  Poorly sewn hem and edges unraveling.
